channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Author of leaked BBC memo tells MPs broadcaster ‘not institutionally biased’ – latest updates
item.description: Michael Prescott tells select committee ‘there was no ideology at play’ when he wrote memo Caroline Daniel is also asked about her views on editorial ...

item.title: EU leaders welcome ‘new momentum’ in Ukraine peace talks but stress red lines on territory – Europe live
item.description: Swedish PM says Russia ‘must be forced to the negotiating table’ as European leaders meet in Angola to discuss Geneva talks US and Ukraine promise ‘up...

item.title: Overwhelming majority of Americans oppose military action in Venezuela, poll finds, as US prepares for next phase of operations – live
item.description: Seventy percent of Americans oppose to US military action in Venezuela, CBS News/YouGov poll finds; Trump administration labels Maduro as member of fo...

item.title: Risk of Maccabi Tel Aviv facing antisemitic attacks not ‘predominant’ reason for match ban, police tell MPs – UK politics live
item.description: West Midlands police’s assistant chief constable says threat of violence by Maccabi fans was more important consideration Badenoch says the government...

item.title: Reeves expected to reveal cut in growth forecasts for next five years in budget
item.description: OBR has reportedly downgraded predictions after review that blames lack of investment under Tories Could you do better than Reeves as chancellor? Play...

item.title: Debate over changing name of Prince Andrew Way
item.description: Mid and East Antrim councillors will discuss a proposal to change a street sign named after Andrew Mountbatten Windsor.

item.title: Two peers to be suspended from House of Lords for breaking rules
item.description: Former Army chief Lord Richard Dannatt and businessman Lord Evans of Watford face suspensions.

item.title: Philly fail in Dallas & Mahomes saves Chiefs - best of NFL week 12
item.description: Our weekly pick of the best of NFL Sunday, including analysis of the Dallas Cowboys' epic comeback against the Philadelphia Eagles.

item.title: Abducted child's father tells BBC he felt helpless as he saw mass Nigerian kidnapping
item.description: The raid on a Catholic school in the West African state came amid a surge in attacks by armed groups.

item.title: Zelensky warns against giving away territory as latest Ukraine talks end
item.description: Talks in Geneva between US and Ukrainian officals have ended with "progress" made - but sticking points remain.
